plot: Emerging over the hillside comes a laughing sun. The sun, with the face of George Walker Bush, recognizes something. There are rabbits running around the oil fields! Beams emerge from his eyes and begin blasting everything in sight!!
title: State of the Union
plot_es: Emerging over the hillside comes a laughing sun. The sun, with the face of George Walker Bush, recognizes something. There are rabbits running around the oil fields! Beams emerge from his eyes and begin blasting everything in sight!!
plot_en: Emerging over the hillside comes a laughing sun. The sun, with the face of George Walker Bush, recognizes something. There are rabbits running around the oil fields! Beams emerge from his eyes and begin blasting everything in sight!!
